headline: Canadian Clawback Threat Puts GM Layoffs And Capital Returns In Focus
summary: Canadian government seeks to recover incentive funds after General Motors (NYSE:GM) announces another round of layoffs at its Oshawa, Ontario plant. The cuts mark a second workforce reduction at the facility within six months, increasing pressure on GM's employment commitments in Canada. The dispute centers on how prior government support aligns with GM's recent decisions on production and staffing in its Canadian operations. For you as an investor, this dispute touches both on how GM...
